name: Resource Monitor Configuration File
summary: Learn about .RESMONCFG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: RESMONCFG files can be used for creating performance profiles to examine and compare resource utilization over multiple runs.

description: Settings file created by Resource Monitor, a system performance monitoring tool included with Windows; saved using XML formatting and includes user resource monitoring selections such as which processes or resource types to monitor.
